review: Slowest app I've ever used. always freezes, have to load it minimum 2 times every single time I go to use it

Updates broke it. Can't properly place order or scan my barcode in store sometimes. I also no longer get receipts which is a big problem in my email and recent orders juudu takes me to select a store...
It only lets me order from the Walmart McDonald's and not the regular one for delivery
Reward points expire. They're not real, they will not rot, they should not expire.
